name: psi-header
description: Inserts a file header into the currently active file.

psi-header.config.description: An optional set of global configuration options.

forceToTop.description: If true, the header is inserted at the top of the page, otherwise it is inserted at the cursor.

blankLinesAfter.description: The number of blank lines to insert after the header comment.

license.description: Identifies which license to use.  this should be either a SPDX license I (refer to https://spdx.org/licenses/) or "Custom".

psi-header.license-text.description: Custom license text used where psi-header.config.license = Custom

psi-header.variables.description: An array of key value pairs that define the template variables.

psi-header.lang-config.description: An optional set of language-specific syntax settings.

language.description: The language that this entry applies to, or '*' for the default.

mapTo.description: The name of the language to copy settings from.  All other settings are ignored if this one is provided.

begin.description: The string that defines the beginning of the header comment block.

prefix.description: The string that defines the beginning of each line of the header comment block.

end.description: The string that defines the end of the header comment block.

forceToTop.description: Overrides the global setting for this language.

blankLinesAfter.description: Overrides the global setting for this language.

psi-header.templates.description: An optional set of language-specific templates

language.description: The language that this entry applies to, or '*' for the default.

mapTo.description: The name of the language to copy the template from.  All other settings are ignored if this one is provided.

template.description: The template text provides as an array of strings.
